clauses.scope: The Vendor shall supply goods or services as specified in the purchase order.
clauses.payment: Payments shall be made within 30 days from the date of invoice.
clauses.indemnity: The Vendor agrees to indemnify the Client against third-party claims.
clauses.liability: The Vendorâ€™s liability shall be limited to the contract value.
clauses.termination: Either party may terminate this agreement with 15 days written notice.
clauses.jurisdiction: Courts in India shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
